vendor_name: Mr. and Mrs. White Hotel Corfu
title: Stylish Adults-Only Greek Island Getaway
description: Escape to the idyllic Greek Island of Corfu, easily accessible from mainland Europe. Enjoy a romantic getaway in the quaint seaside village of Acharavi, and spend four nights at the brand-new boutique hotel, Mr & Mrs White Hotel Corfu. Enjoy daily breakfast, a three-course dinner for two, a welcome drink on arrival, 10% off food at the stylish hotel's restaurant, an early check-in and late checkout, and complimentary Wi-Fi throughout your stay.
